thread.title: A wonderful experience and I felt right at home
thread.title_full: A wonderful experience and I felt right at home - Review of The Pierre, A Taj Hotel, New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Jane W
title: A wonderful experience and I felt right at home
text:
I loved my room. Well appointed with soft colors, a lot of light, beautiful drapes - and black out shades for comfortable sleeping. The staff was SO friendly and gracious in every aspect. I had three nights of restful bliss.
Room Tip: A tower room on a high floor facing the Park is both quiet and captivating! See more room tips
